name: Deep Breath (PK)
description:
Control your team of recovery divers as you search the ocean floor for the lost black box recorder. Manage your breathing to control your limited oxygen supply as you descend into the depths. Keep an eye on your vital signs, if you start to panic bring your breathing under control to avoid wasting precious oxygen. Locate the black box recorder and bring it to the surface. Find resources in the environment to progress and be careful, not all of the wildlife is friendly! Gamepad required. A Global Game Jam effort by Courtney Sproule, Paul Kelly and William Barr.

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/deep-breaths-7
